DEFAULT_PROPERTIES_EXT

public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_PROPERTIES_EXT
Default extension for storage file.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Storage

public Storage()
Creates new instance of Storage for storing temporary data. The Storage directory is initialized by getTemporaryStorageDirectory() value.

Since:
VisualVM 1.2

Storage

public Storage(java.io.File directory)
Creates new instance of Storage.

Parameters:
directory - directory where storage data will be stored.

Storage

public Storage(java.io.File directory,
               java.lang.String propertiesFile)
Creates new instance of Storage.

Parameters:
directory - directory where storage data will be stored.
propertiesFile - filename of storage file.

Returns true if storage directory exists, false otherwise.

setCustomProperty

public void setCustomProperty(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String value)
Sets persistent custom property. Since VisualVM 1.2 clears the property for null value.

Parameters:
key - property name.
value - property value or (since VisualVM 1.2) null

setCustomProperties

public void setCustomProperties(java.lang.String[] keys,
                                java.lang.String[] values)
Sets persistent custom properties. Since VisualVM 1.2 a property is cleared for null value.

Parameters:
keys - property names.
values - property values.

getTemporaryStorageDirectoryString

public static java.lang.String getTemporaryStorageDirectoryString()
Returns default storage directory for temporary (runtime) DataSource data

Returns:
default storage directory for temporary (runtime) DataSource data

getTemporaryStorageDirectory

public static java.io.File getTemporaryStorageDirectory()
Returns default storage directory for temporary (runtime) DataSource data. This directory is deleted when VisualVM session finishes, eventually on new VisualVM session startup.

Returns:
default storage directory for temporary (runtime) DataSource data

getPersistentStorageDirectoryString

public static java.lang.String getPersistentStorageDirectoryString()
Returns default storage directory for persistent DataSource data

Returns:
default storage directory for persistent DataSource data

public static java.io.File getPersistentStorageDirectory()
Returns default storage directory for persistent DataSource data

Returns:
default storage directory for persistent DataSource data

persistentStorageDirectoryExists

public static boolean persistentStorageDirectoryExists()
Returns true if persistent storage directory exists, false otherwise.

Returns:
true if persistent storage directory exists, false otherwise.
